segments.text: I see water streaming down the fronts of the cabinets, creating a slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so frustrating to see the woman just standing there, oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle on the floor is getting wider and wider.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes near the sink look like they've been washed and are ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman must be really tired or distracted not to notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window highlights the ordinary domestic setting, despite the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm annoyed that no one has turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel bunched around the plate she's drying looks like it's been used quite a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will slip on the wet floor and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window and tidy garden outside contrast sharply with the interior scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the water soon before it causes any more damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
